name: places/ChIJUxriNA9ZwokRMKgICTh5kHQ
adrFormatAddress: 570 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
My second AMC theater I've been too and had an amazing experience. The staff was friendly of course. this place is big. I'm still getting use to AMC. My main theater is Regal and I got so used to regal especially the recliner chairs. It still feels weird because although the seats are comfortable it feels like the seats are too close to one another and also my legs is long so it cramps up sometimes. overall my experience was good I can't wait to go back.

Update: I went back to see Argylle. I was in auditorium 8 for the 1:30 PM showing on 2/10/2024. The screen was dark. The lighting of the movie was bad. By that I mean something was wrong with the projector they use to show the film. although I saw this movie before I was disappointed because the projector. I left 1 hour into the film because I couldn't watch it when the projector wasn't working properly. This location is my favorite AMC location so I'm hoping they fix it. Also the theaters was packed so this could have been someone's first time watching the movie and the projector wasn't working properly

originalText.text: I wanted to give a special shout out to Carlos who was so helpful and professional yesterday when I needed to cancel my Fandango purchase and use my complimentary voucher instead. He was so patient and helpful. The staff at this movie theater go above and beyond the call of duty which is most appreciated. The theater is clean and they usually have a great selection of movies to choose from.  Comfy, spacious seats. My only request is that I hope they can adjust the volume of the previews/commercials which is deafening!  (Am I the only one who notices this?)

originalText.text: One of my favorite theaters in New York. I go frequently because of the big screens, and as an AMC a-lister, I’m often there. Easy to sneak in beer and in always stoned off my gourd. Don’t think I’ve ever been in this building without being high as heck

originalText.text: This theater is far away from me, but I am willing to travel. They always have space to watch the movies at, not like the others ones that get sold out. It’s very clean. I come here a lot and the only thing I have to complain about is that they either run out of the pretzel bites or their drink machines are out of order and you have to go 2 floors up to get some. Other than that this theater is great.

originalText.text: Exceeded my expectations. It has been over 20 years since I have seen a movie at this multiplex. I liked it then, now I love this place. Small stadium like, but two intimate to be called stadium seating. I personally prefer not to  have food servers in a theater. Just comfortable, really comfortable seats. A big screen and superb sound. Kips Bay delivers and I am so glad to become reacquainted with this better than excellent theater.
